name: Teleport Up
description:
The first Pirate Sci-Fi Platformer even dreamt of, Teleport Up is a classic platformer with a twist - instead of jumping, you teleport up.

This project is in very early development.  So far, all player movement has been coded, but no enemies or collectables have been, and only the tutorial level has been made.

Check out v0.1 to see the potential of this game through the tutorial level. Please leave your feedback in the comments section!

Previously raised issues:

  • Pirate skin doesn't look nice - maybe the design is too complicated?
